snippet: Marc Gasol, who “looks like he lost 50 pounds,” according to one teammate, was averaging 20.2 points a game entering Sunday amid speculation he might leave the Memphis Grizzlies as a free agent.
abstract: Memphis Grizzlies center Marc Gasol, who lost considerable weight in the off-season, is averaging 20.2 points per game while leading Memphis to league-best 15-2 start, but he might leave Grizzlies as a free agent after this season.
lead_paragraph: Marc Gasol, who “looks like he lost 50 pounds,” according to one teammate, was averaging 20.2 points a game entering Sunday amid speculation he might leave the Memphis Grizzlies as a free agent.

headline.seo: Grizzlies' Marc Gasol Loses Weight and Helps Memphis Chase a Title
headline.main: A Big Man Shrinks Into a New Role
headline.print_headline: A Big Man Shrinks Into a New Role
